articles.title: New Certificate Manager Release

articles.title: Self-Sovereign Identity Updates
articles.summary: Swiss SSI Group announces major updates to credential issuer and DID resolver components. New support for did:web and did:jwk methods.

articles.title: ASP.NET Core Security Best Practices
articles.summary: Updated comprehensive guide on implementing security features in ASP.NET Core applications, including authentication, authorization, and certificate management.
